content: 228 giraffe cocoon crochet pattern 0-2months materials needed red heart super saver 7oz/198g/364yds/333m/#4 med weight gold x 2skeins coffee x 1skein warm brown x 2oz yarn needle us h8/5 00mm hook us i9/5 50mm hook gauge i hook= 3sc=1 3sc row+1 skill level easy cocoon round 1 rs with gold yarn and i hook ch2 6sc in 2nd chain from hook continue in a spiral fashion using a placemarker if desired 6sc round 2 2sc in each single_crochet around 12sc round 3 *1sc in next single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to* around 18sc round 4 *1sc in the next 2sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 24sc round 5 *1sc in the next 3sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 30sc round 6 *1sc in the next 4sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 36sc rnd7 *1sc in each of the next 5sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 42sc round 8 *1sc in the next 6sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 48sc round 9 *1sc in he next 7sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 54sc round 10 *1sc in the next 8sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 60sc round 11 *1sc in the next 9sc 2sc in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 66sc round 12 1sc in each single_crochet around 66sc rnds 13-44 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet around 66hdc note you are now changing from working in rounds to working in row row 1 ch1 turn 1hdc in next 64hdc ch1 turn 64hdc neck opening row 2-7 1hdc in each half_double_crochet across ch1 turn 64hdc end of row 7 fasten_off and weave in ends neck trim round 1 with i hook and coffee attach yarn to back of cocoon on row7 on the inside or wrong side of cocoon 1sc in same st as joining 1sc in each single_crochet around neck opening slip_stitch to join ch1 rnds 2-3 1sc in each single_crochet around entire neck opening slip_stitch to join ch1 end of round 3 fasten_off and weave in ends turn collar down as shown in pictures beanie ch3 counts as first double_crochet round 1 rs with gold yarn and h hook chain 3 11dc in 3rd chain from hook slip_stitch to join ch3 12dc round 2 1dc in same st as joining 2dc in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to join ch3 24dc round 3 2dc in next double_crochet *double_crochet in next double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet * repeat from *to * around slip_stitch to join ch3 36dc 2 round 4 1dc in the next 4dc 2dc in the next double_crochet *1dc in the next 5dc 2dc in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join ch3 42dc rnds 5-8 double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to join ch3 48dc round
